cards.rules_text:
When Burnout is put into your hand or kept in your opening hand, reveal it, then put it onto the battlefield with three motivation counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a motivation counter on Burnout. At the beginning of your end step, if Burnout has no motivation counters on it, sacrifice Burnout.
{1}{R}{R}, Sacrifice Burnout: Deal 10 damage to a permanent.
Copy the last spell other than Blueprint that you cast this turn. You may choose new targets for the copy.
Deal 4 damage to each tapped creature, then tap all creature you don't control and put a stun counter on them.
Exile your hand. For each card exiled, deal 7 damage to target permanent.
When Ghost Rider enters the battlefield, put target creature card that entered the graveyard this turn onto the battlefield with a finality counter on it.

When Alioth enters the battlefield, remove the text from all creatures target player controls. [i](They lose all keywords, activated abilities, triggered abilities, and static abilities. Auras and Equipment cards played before Alioth affecting the creature are disabled.)[/i]

Companion — Your deck consists of exactly 7 cards. [i](If this card is your chosen companion, you may put it into your hand from outside the game for {3} as a sorcery.)[/i]
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may reveal Arishem from your hand. If you do, you may open a sealed [i]Magic[/i] booster pack, then shuffle those cards into your library.

When Mr. Negative enters the battlefield, gain an emblem with “Creatures in your hand and under your control have their mana value and power swapped.” [i](Their power is equal to their mana value, casting the creature costs colorless mana equal to their power.)[/i]
Whenever a card is cast for less mana than their mana value, counter that spell.

Solemn Vigil costs {1} less to cast for each creature that died this turn.
Draw 2 cards.
When Recurring Villain is discarded, you may return it from the graveyard to your hand. If you do, lose 2 life and draw a card.

First strike
Whenever Violet Evergarden, Soldier Maiden deals damage to a creature, set it's base power to 0, then put a page counter on Violet Evergarden, Soldier Maiden.
{T}: Draw cards equal to the number of page counters on Violet Evergarden, Soldier Maiden, then remove a page counter.
Each consecutive time you cast a card with the same name, it costs {1} less for each card with the same name cast before it.
The first triggered ability that you control each turn triggers twice.

When Wooly, Elephant Quest enters the battlefield, sacrifice an artifact. Search your library for an artifact equipment card with converted mana cost equal to 1 plus the sacrificed artifact's converted mana cost, put that card onto the battlefield attached to Wooly, Elephant Quest, then shuffle your library.

Deathtouch
Companion — Each non-land card in your starting deck has a different mana cost. [i]({2} is different than {1}{U}, {U}{U}, or {U}{R} for example.)[/i] 
Whenever Nyxia, the Dragon's Embrace enters the battlefield, for each non-land permanent you control with different mana values, destroy up to one target permanent an opponent controls with the same mana value.

Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature, that many minus one +1/+1 counters are put on that permanent instead, then put a +1/+1 counter on Fugue, Traveler of No Return. 
Whenever Fugue, Traveler of No Return attacks, exile the top X cards of your library, where X is equal to Fugue, Traveler of No Return's power. You may play those cards this turn.

Jane Doe can't block and can't be blocked.
At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, you may have that player gain control of Jane Doe until end of turn. If you do, untap Jane Doe, goad it, and it can't be sacrificed this turn.
Whenever Jane Doe deals combat damage to a player, that player reveals their hand. Jane Doe's owner chooses a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
